name: LOST SOULS (Dyore)
description:
-It is recommended to play the downloadable version since the browser version is buggy currently-

In the forest of lost souls, there is a lot of souls of people who lost the meaning of their life,

your goal is to make them chase you and lead them to the door of memories, which will help them remember themselves and find the meaning of their life again.

the game was made in 3 days during global game jam 2021.
